Directed by Elem Klimov

Starring: Alex Kravchenko, Olga Mironova, Lyubomiras Lautsyavichyus, Vladas Bagdonas Yurs Lumiste, Victor Lorenz, Kazimir Rabetsky, Eugene Tilicheev, Alexander Byrd, Anatoly Slivnikov, Peter Merkuriev, G.Velts, Tatiana Shestakov, Vladimir Vasilyev, Igor Gnevashev
Description: The film is based on documentary evidence and refers to "Khatyn story" Adamovich. The authors describe the place and events that have become a symbol of national tragedy. Flair - a boy of sixteen, to dig out of scraps of barbed wire, rusty gun belts and helmets riddled rifle and went to the forest to the guerrillas. In the beginning he is just a kid. In the end, through the horror of the Nazi becomes amazingly grown even - old. The war had distorted the once tender childish traits and turned them into the wrinkles of old age ...
